article_title: Health Adviser Gruber Logged Several White House Visits
article_text:
Jonathan Gruber, the economist at the heart of a fresh debate about the Affordable Care Act, has had more than a dozen appointments to visit the White House since Democrats began drafting the health law in 2009, records show.

The visits included at least one group meeting with President Barack Obama, as well as appointments with senior administration officials who helped shape the 2010 law that expanded health insurance to millions...
